page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: INVERMORISTON is a small community of scattered houses, situated in a narrow glen near the mouth of the River Moriston which flows into Loch Ness. It stands half-way up the Great Glen and Caledonian Canal at the junction of two roads ,A82(Fort William/Inver- ness) and A887(Isle of skye/Inverness) The landscape is steep glen-sides, heavily wooded.Some of the woodland is of natural deciduous trees and some is Forestry Commission coniferous plant- ations.Farmland and crofts have mainly cattle and sheep. Glenmoriston Estate caters well for holiday and sporting activities such as fishing and game shooting.Holiday accommodation is available in hotel, chalets,camp-site and Bed&Breakfast houses and caravans.
